title: Download OO Containerized chart package
content:
Download the zip file from the software website to a control plane node.

The Helm chart versions are indicated using the x.x notation. Replace it with the version relevant to your deployment. For example, if your deployment needs version 25.2.0 Helm chart package, replace oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x.zip with oo-helm-charts-1.7.0+25.2.0.zip. 

Follow these steps:

  1. Download the .zip file from the Software Licenses and Downloads website.
  2. Copy the file to a temporary directory on a control plane node. 
  3. Unzip the package: 
    unzip oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x.zip

The following table describes the essential files inside the OO Containerized chart package:

Name

File

OO Helm chart file

oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x/oo-helm-charts/charts/oo-1.x.x+26.x.x.tgz

Example persistent volume and persistent volume claims yaml files

 Persistent volume templates:
oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x/oo-helm-charts/samples/persistent_storage/on_premises/volumes.yaml

Persistent volume claims templates:
oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x/oo-helm-charts/samples/persistent_storage/on_premises/claims.yaml

Persistent volume Readme file:
oo-helm-charts-1.x.x+26.x.x/oo-helm-charts/samples/persistent_storage/on_premises/README
